source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a static wide shot of a grey brick building wall in an urban alley. The wall is positioned at an angle, extending from the right foreground to the left background. The scene is initially plain, featuring a doorway on the far right, a boarded-up arched window in the center-right, and a "NO PARKING" sign in the middle ground on the left. Animated graphics then appear sequentially on the wall. First, a large, orange and green hand-like shape holding a horn materializes in the right foreground, partially covering the doorway. Simultaneously, a stylized yellow fire hydrant appears in the center-right foreground below the window, a blue character appears to its left, and a small, colorful bush forms in the bottom left. Subsequently, a black lamppost appears to the left of the arched window, and a large green tree-like figure on a pink base materializes on the left side of the frame, creating a complete mural. The camera remains stationary at an eye-level height throughout the transformation.
